meanings: a borrowed barley bag, a cat in a strange garret

vlive.korean: 근데 전 꿈 자체를 별로 안 꾸는 사람이라 범규 꿈 자주 꿔요? But I don't dream frequently. Do you have dreams frequently? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 최범규의 별밤✨
vlive.english: But I don't dream frequently. Do you have dreams frequently?

vlive.korean: 이 노래를 들으며 뭔가 꿈을 꾸는 사람들이 되게 많지 않았을까? Wouldn't there be many people dreaming while listening to this song? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] Rocket Punch X LieV - 로켓펀치의 눕방라이브!
vlive.english: Wouldn't there be many people dreaming while listening to this song?

vlive.korean: 예지몽을 꾸는 거예요 너무 기대가 되니까 - 야 근데 누가 누군지... I had a special dream about the future. - Hey, I can't tell which one is me. 듣기 View video AB6IX : ABNEW 1ST OFFICIAL FANKIT UNBOXING
vlive.english: I had a special dream about the future. - Hey, I can't tell which one is me.

vlive.korean: 좋은 꿈 꾸세요. 꿈을 꾸는건 좋은 거에요. Sweet dreams. It's always good to dream. 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 찬이의 "방" 🐺 Ep. 15 - Outro!
vlive.english: Sweet dreams. It's always good to dream.

vlive.korean: 그러니까 꿈 속의 꿈 - 꿈 속에서 꿈을 또 꾸는 거! dreaming inside a dream. - So you dream inside a dream again! 듣기 View video NCT : [BOOM!] 00즈💚TMI BOMB!💣
vlive.english: dreaming inside a dream. - So you dream inside a dream again!

examples.korean: Dreamers do not always remember their dreams. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 꿈을 꾸는 사람들이 자신의 꿈을 항상 기억하는 것은 아니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Dreamers do not always remember their dreams. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She had a dreamy look in her eyes. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 두 눈에 꿈을 꾸는 듯한 표정을 담고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: I don’t like to borrow from friends. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 친구들에게서 돈을 꾸는 걸 좋아하지 않는다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: To your dreaming mind, teeth symbolize conversations. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 꿈을 꾸는 마음 속에선, 이(齒)는 대화를 상징합니다. Neungyule
